notes.text:
This update for procps fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2023-4016: Fixed ps buffer overflow (bsc#1214290).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Under some circumstances, this weakness allows a user who has access to run the “ps” utility on a machine, the ability to write almost unlimited amounts of unfiltered data into the process heap.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
